title: Elementary Teacher K-5 Openings for the 25-26 school year (Full and Part Time)
status: Full Time and Part Time (please indicate on application if you are ONLY interested in Part Time positions)The salary for this position is assigned to the TT Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkTT Salary Schedule.WCSD will recognize no more than thirteen full time, complete years of previous teaching experience when placing on the TT Salary Schedule.
